title: Encyclopedia of Comic Book Heroes V1-3
description:
To be very clear; these are not comic books. They don't even resemble comic books. They are, in fact, encyclopedias. I'd like to think I'm wrong, but I don't believe any publisher would attempt something with so few illustrations these days (and they do have illustrations, the same way a real encyclopedia would have them).

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Encyclopedia of Comic Book Heroes V1 Batman
Collier Books, 1976, 402 pages 
Written by Michael L Fleischer
Assisted by Janet E Lincoln

Encyclopedia of Comic Book Heroes V2 Wonder Woman
Collier Books, 1976, 273 pages 
Written by Michael L Fleischer
Assisted by Janet E Lincoln

Encyclopedia of Comic Book Heroes V3 Superman
Harmony Book, 1978, 530 pages
Written by Michael L Fleischer
Assisted by Janet E Lincoln
